All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlreadyAppliedException
Custom exception thrown when a user trys to apply for a job that they have already applied for.
AppSecurityConfig
Security configuration class to define the security settings of the application.
AuthenticationService
Service for handling authentication-related tasks such as retrieving the current authenticated user and logging out the user.
Candidate
Represents a candidate user in the system.
CandidateController
Controller class for managing candidate-related operations, including updating candidate information, applying to job ads, and viewing applied job ads.
CandidateDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for the Candidate entity
CandidateRepository
Repository interface for managing Candidate entities.
CandidateService
Service class for managing candidate operations This class handles CRUD operations for candidates, authentication and logic integration
CustomUserDetailsService
This service is responsible for loading user details based on the username, and it checks for both Candidate and Recruiter entities.
CvFileNotFoundException
Custom exception thrown when a CV (curriculum vitae) file is not found.
CvFileSaveException
 
DreamWorkApplication
 
ErrorResponse
A class representing the structure of an error response returned.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Handles errors that happen in the application and provides clear responses to clients.
IncorrectPasswordException
Custom exception thrown when the password not correct .
IndexController
Controller class for managing the landing page.
JobAd
Represents a job ad in the system
JobAdController
Controller class for handling job ads-related operations such as listing, filtering, and viewing job ad details.
JobAdDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for the JobAd entity
JobAdNotFoundException
Custom exception thrown when a Job Ad is not found.
JobAdRepository
Repository interface for managing JobAd entities
JobAdService
Service class for managing job ad operations.
Recruiter
Represents a recruiter user in the system.
RecruiterController
Controller for handling recruiter-related operations.
RecruiterDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for the Recruiter entity
RecruiterRepository
Repository interface for managing Recruiter entities.
RecruiterService
Service class for managing recruiter operations This class handles CRUD operations for candidates, authentication and logic integration
Role
Enum representing the roles available in the system.
Seniority
Enum representing the seniority levels for job positions.
User
Represents a base class for all user types in the system.
UserAlreadyExistsException
Custom exception thrown when a user by registration already exists by username or email.
UserController
Controller for handling user-related actions such as registration, login, and account management.
UserDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for the User entity
UserNotFoundException
Custom exception thrown when a user not found by username or email.
